author: Special Correspondent
text:
An election flying squad team confiscated Rs. 13 lakh from a jeep transporting cash from a bank branch at Aapakkodal to an ATM at Athani on Tuesday as the supporting documents could not be produced on the spot by the travellers.

The cash found in the possession of the employees of CMS Cash Management Services was handed over to the Returning Officer for Bhavani Assembly segment Mariammal, who is the District Adi Dravida and Scheduled Tribes Welfare Officer. The Returning Officer deposited the amount in the treasury.

Later in the day, the money was returned to the firm after the documents were furnished, official sources added.
title: Rs. 13 lakh returned
